column2: §MED-G: Increase Large Gift Size§!
Increase the size of gifts that are sent using the special §YED-G: Send Large Gift§! targeted decision
§MED-G: Decrease Large Gift Size§!
Decrease the size of gifts that are sent using the special §YED-G: Send Large Gift§! targeted decision
§MED-G: Send Large Gift§!
Send a large gift to [Root.GetTitledFirstName], with §Yno effect on opinion§!.
Large gifts have NOT been disabled. (They can be re-enabled via a self-targeted decision.)
